out_desc_tool: Reading comprehension subtest scores on the Iowa Tests of Basic Skills (ITBS, Form J, Level 9 or 10  Hiero- nymus & Hoover, 1990) were used as measures of cognitive achievement. The reading subtest includes 49 items on proficiency in understanding text passages.

out_desc_red: Reading comprehension subtest scores on the Iowa Tests of Basic Skills (ITBS, Form J, Level 9 or 10  Hiero- nymus & Hoover, 1990) were used as measures of cognitive achievement. The reading subtest includes 49 items on proficiency in understanding text passages.
out_tit_math: ITBS Math Achievement (retained vs matched promoted)
out_desc_math: Subtest scores on the Iowa Tests of Basic Skills (ITBS, Form J, Level 9 or 10  Hiero- nymus & Hoover, 1990) were used as measures of mathematics achievement. The mathematics subtest includes 95 items on computation, concepts, and problem solving.

out_desc_tool: Reading-Curriculum Based Measurement (R-CBM). The R-CBM measure consisted of three, 1 min reading passages of grade level difficulty. The same three passages were used for fall, winter, and spring assessment within a grade level, with the median number of words read correct across the three passages used as the datum for a student.
